p: HO-1 is involved in a wide range of diseases in many types of mammalian tissue including the liver, artery and neuron. Although the effect of HO-1 induction is controversial in some types of diseases, there are several cases showing the benefits of antioxidant and anti-inflammatory effects of HO-1. Here we introduced five types of diseases in which HO-1 induction is confirmed to be beneficial by genetic knockout experiments in vitro and in vivo.
